thread.title: Chance the Rapper Reveals Schedule for Spring Tour
thread.title_full: Chance the Rapper Reveals Schedule for Spring Tour | Complex

author: Edwin Ortiz
title: Chance the Rapper Reveals Schedule for Spring Tour
text:
Chance the Rapper Reveals Schedule for Spring Tour By Edwin Ortiz Edwin Ortiz is the news editor for Complex Musicâ€‹. Follow @iTunesEra .
  Image via Getty Chance the Rapper follows up his historic night at the 2017 Grammys by announcing his spring tour. The 37-date trek kicks off in early April and goes through June, with an additional date in October.
"thank YOU GUYS for everything," Chance wrote on Instagram. Tickets for his tour go on sale tonight at 7 p.m. ET and will be available on his official website .
Check out the full schedule below.
  thank YOU GUYS for everything. tour goes on sale at ChanceRaps.com at 7pm ET 
A post shared by Chance The Rapper (@chancetherapper) on Feb 14, 2017 at 6:00am PST

Related Chance the Rapper Remixed Drake's "Grammys" as Ode to His Historic Win Watch Chance the Rapper Perform "How Great" and "All We Got" at 2017 Grammys The Grammys Proved That Hip-Hop Is Still the Heart of Musical Innovation Tags: News , Chance The Rapper
